titles.title: By the power of Thy life break the power of my dea

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
By the power of Thy life break the power of my death
Father God I lift my cry up unto Thee
Bring forth this vessel still as Thy glory and Thy will
Flow through my heart and mind and set me free.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Give ear, O ye heavens and give ear, O ye earth
Listen ye gates of hell and all beneath
O death, I am thy plagues and O grave thy destruction
O death and grave, I am thy victory.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
So whether there be mountains or valleys in between
Whether there be perils or the sword
I know that my Redeemer lives and in my flesh I'll see God
The Light and Lamb of God forevermore.
